DOC.brief_summary: To determine pregnant woman understand instruction , carry test , interpret test result regard need follow-up treatment woman recruit complete test instruction comprehension assessment usability assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Usability Clinical Utility Congo Red Dot Test : A Survey
DOC.detailed_description: To determine pregnant woman understand instruction , carry test , interpret test result regard need follow-up treatment woman recruit complete test instruction comprehension assessment usability assessment . Study participant convenience sample woman seek prenatal service . Participants first ask review instruction Congo Red Dot Test complete short write questionnaire ass comprehension test instruction . Participants ask perform test use urine sample interpret result obtain answer second write questionnaire . After woman performs test , healthcare provider use urine sample perform second test .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Eligible consent research Able read Spanish well enough read test instruction Able give inform consent
